docs.title: What is Awesome Data Philippines
docs.text: Awesome Data Philippines is an unfunded effort to collect and curate links to data sources and datasets that may be relevant to those doing research and analysis in the Philippine context.

docs.title: Making data accessible and usable
docs.text: The goal is to not only make the data accessible but also provide examples on how to use the data with a focus on using open source applications such as QGIS.
